statements: SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT id, balance, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE last_transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 5000 ORDER BY last_transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, full_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%' OR full_name LIKE 'A%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, account_number, balance, last_transaction_date FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance < 0 AND last_transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY account_number ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE balance > 500;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE balance < 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, balance, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM account_balance ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'withdrawal' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM account_balance GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT name, amount FROM customers JOIN account_balance ON customers.customer_id = account_balance.customer_id WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers JOIN personal_details ON customers.customer_id = personal_details.customer_id
SELECT c.customer_name, a.balance, t.amount FROM accounts a JOIN customers c ON a.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id = t.account_id
SELECT t.transaction_date, t.transaction_type, t.amount FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id JOIN customers c ON a.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY open_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, street_address, city, state FROM addresses WHERE zipcode = '12345';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT c.full_name, a.balance, t.amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN accounts a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id INNER JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id = t.account_id WHERE t.type = 'deposit';
SELECT c.full_name, ad.city, ad.state FROM customers c LEFT JOIN addresses ad ON c.customer_id = ad.customer_id WHERE ad.city = 'New York';
SELECT c.full_name, cr.card_number FROM customers c INNER JOIN cards cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id WHERE cr.expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
